name: Display Assembly
description: A new OLED display assembly to repair a damaged screen.

name: Battery
description: A new battery to restore your device to 100%.

name: Rear Housing
description: A new housing and frame to replace a cracked back.

name: Charging Port
description: A new charging port to restore device charging.

name: Microphone
description: A new Microphone to restore sound pickup.

name: Rear Camera Lens
description: A new replacement camera lens if one of yours is damaged.

name: Earpiece Speaker
description: A replacement speaker if you cannot hear on phone calls.

name: Loudspeaker
description: A replacement loudspeaker if you cannot hear any audio.

name: Button Fault
description: A replacement button flex if one of yours isn't working.

name: Unsure
description: Book your device in with us diagnosis if you aren't sure.
